name: Stickman Trick Shot Basketball
description:
Use crazy obstacles to sink insane trick shots in Stickman Trick Shot Basketball!

Bounce the ball off of random objects and try to score a shot that's fancy enough to unlock the next level.
Start in the streets and keep moving your way up to the beach court & gym!

• Simple controls: just tap, pull back, aim and release to shoot the ball

• 3 stages - Streets, Beach and Gym with challenging levels and unique obstacles

• Endless addictive fun... keep finding crazier ways to sink the basket!

• Compete with other players worldwide on the leaderboards

Hit the court and see how creative you can get!
